page.title: 01INTRODUCING OUR D BLOCK
page.content: The block 04480096 is situated on the extreme north coast of the Isle of Wight. The block is almost evenly divided by the mouth of the River Medina and the major part of the block is comprised of the sea, part of the Solent.The area is predominantly urban- light industrial,commercial and residential. The town is noted for its close links with the sea and is known as the yachting centre of the world.The area is subject to seasonal variation and is also suffering from unemployment due to the present economic climate. Many of the light industries service the yachting community and are situated on the shores of the Medina.Cowes is linked to the mainland by ferry and hydrofoil services and East and West Cowes are connected by a chain ferry.
